column1: 411311,Diversional Therapist,,"Develop treatment plans that use non-medical therapies
column3: Train patients, family members or caregivers in techniques for managing disabilities or illnesses
column5: Encourage patients or clients to develop life skills
column7: Provide health and wellness advice to patients, program participants or caregivers
column11: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column13: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column15: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column17: Gather medical information from patient histories
column19: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column21: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
